comments.body:
It looks like the `license_file` is not included in the source distribution. Please manually package it:

https://conda-forge.org/docs/meta.html#packaging-the-license-manually

Also could you raise an issue with the developers to include the `license_file` in the source distribution and copy the url for the issue into the recipe as a comment. This acts as a reminder when you go to update the recipe in the future to check whether the `license_file` might be included and will no longer need to be included in the recipe since it will come in via the source.
Thank you very much for the input. I have added the license file.
Hm, it's not clear to me how to resolve this change request automatically. Should be done with https://github.com/conda-forge/staged-recipes/pull/5707/commits/18fc35716c907a869cb3cc74b1273a3986ed0ffd
